title: As of today, Blizzard has won
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2Rxoz13Bthc
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eYNCCu0y-Is

New WoW expansion hasn't promised anything that isn't already presentable (so pretty much no cut features confirmed), and it's looking amazing.
New SC2 stuff 
New Diablo stuff
New Hearthstone expansion continues to Hearthstone it up really good
New HotS heroes look awesome (Cho'gall is one hero controlled by 2 people and it's as ridiculous and hilarious as it sounds)

Some release info about Activision making a studio for TV shows and stuff (WARCRAFT STYLE GAME OF THRONES TV SHOW PLS PLS PLS PLS PLS PLS PLS)

tldr; blizzard is the victory
